title: OT100: One Hunthread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is a weekly open thread where anyone can post about anything they want or ask random questions.
- The author encourages readers to donate to the Bay Area rationality community center's Patreon.
- Less Wrong has a high-tech meetup page that helps readers find SSC meetups near them.

Key learnings:
- The Bay Area rationality community center still needs more donations to function properly.
- The Less Wrong high-tech meetup page has an option to limit meetups to SSC only.
- The author plans to transfer the meetup tab of the blog to the Less Wrong high-tech meetup page.

Key questions:
- None mentioned in this portion of the blog post.
